mapper.insert: INSERT INTO play_ground_board (title, movie_id, betting_title, vote_end_date, dead_line_date, admin_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{movieId},#{bettingTitle}, #{voteEndDate}, #{deadLineDate}, #{adminId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.poster_url poster_url FROM play_ground_board p JOIN movie m ON p.movie_id = m.id where p.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update play_ground_board set title = #{title}, movie_id = #{movieId}, betting_title = #{bettingTitle}, vote_end_date = #{voteEndDate}, dead_line_date = #{deadLineDate}, left_betting_point = #{leftBettingPoint}, right_betting_point = #{rightBettingPoint}, left_dividend = #{leftDividend}, right_dividend = #{RightDividend}, admin_id = #{adminId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.poster_url AS poster_url FROM play_ground_board p JOIN movie m ON p.movie_id = m.id ORDER BY CASE WHEN p.vote_end_date < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, p.vote_end_date
